title: Welcome to CampusConnect
content: We are excited to launch CampusConnect - your centralized platform for academic resources, notices, events, and more. Please explore all the features and provide your feedback.

title: Mid-Semester Examination Schedule
content: The mid-semester examinations will be conducted from March 15-22, 2024. Please check your individual timetables on the academic portal. All students are required to carry their ID cards during examinations.

title: Library Hours Extended
content: Due to upcoming examinations, library hours have been extended. The library will now be open from 7:00 AM to 11:00 PM on weekdays and 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM on weekends until further notice.
